site_name: Royal Brompton Hospital, Sydney Street, LONDON, SW3 6PY
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 18/03291 (Variation of Condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission PP/16/04357 (Demolition of 30 Britten Street and the matron building (adjacent Dovehouse Street) to facilitate the extension to the existing Sydney Street Hospital to provide a ground plus 5 storey consolidated healthcare building with 2 storeys of basement and a ground plus 2 basement level imaging centre, together with the formation of new pedestrian entrance on Sydney Street, reconfigured vehicular access, associated landscaping and car parking, plant and all necessary enabling works (MAJOR APPLICATION)) to provide a two storey Imaging Centre with a two storey basement, relocation of the substation and associated temporary and enabling works including mobile MRI and support accommodation facilities. (major application).)  to (a) create an exclusion zone, reducing the area of sedum from 403mý to 320 mý;  (b) amend location and extent of first floor rooflights; (c) relocation of boiler flue to North elevation, terminating at roof level; (d) North Elevation (d)(i) removal  of perforated panels to increase natural light; (d)(ii) removal of service door; (d)(iii) amendment to mesh finish to plant equipment acoustic enclosure; (e) addition of glass balustrade to Britten Wing link; (f) East Elevation (f)(i) removal  of perforated panels to increase natural light; (f)(ii) re-location of Level Change; (g) West Elevation(g)(i) reduction in no. of fire exit doors from 2 to 1; (g)(ii) door colour altered to suit adjacent render finish.
